summary: SummaryCharlotte Tilbury's Airbrush Matte Bronzer is an oversized natural matte bronzer in a refillable compact, infused with hyaluronic acid for a skin-perfecting bronzed filter for the face and body.
details: DetailsBenefitsCharlotte created this bronzer to blend with the skin and warm the look of the complexion while blurring the appearance of any imperfections. It's perfect for an all-over face and body bronze or to define and contour.Key IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and helps skin appear softer and smoother.Micro-Fine Perfecting Powders: Deliver an invisibly thin, silky filter on the skin to add an increased depth of color and coverage.Microspheres: Provide long-wear pay off and a silky texture.Formulated WithoutSulfates SLS and SLES. This product is also gluten-free.Item 2619611How To UseApply to your face and body where the sun naturally tans - cheekbones, jawline, top of shoulders, collarbone, and to the center of your arms and legs.Use your skin-enhancing shade to add warmth to your face, neck, décolletage, the tops of shoulders, and down the center of your arms and legs.Use a deeper skin-sculpting shade to contour the neck on either side, shade above and below the collarbone, and shade down the center of the décolletage.Create the illusion of sculpted, contoured limbs by shading down the inner and outer sides of the arms and legs.Buff onto skin and blend with The Air-Brush (sold separately) for a natural-looking, sunkissed finish.IngredientsTalc, Mica, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Dimethicone, Nylon-12, Silica, Zinc Stearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lauroyl Lysine, Potassium Sorbate, Dimethiconol, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydroxystearic Acid. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to your face and body where the sun naturally tans - cheekbones, jawline, top of shoulders, collarbone, and to the center of your arms and legs.Use your skin-enhancing shade to add warmth to your face, neck, décolletage, the tops of shoulders, and down the center of your arms and legs.Use a deeper skin-sculpting shade to contour the neck on either side, shade above and below the collarbone, and shade down the center of the décolletage.Create the illusion of sculpted, contoured limbs by shading down the inner and outer sides of the arms and legs.Buff onto skin and blend with The Air-Brush (sold separately) for a natural-looking, sunkissed finish.
ingredients: Hydroxystearic Acid. May Contain: Iron Oxides (

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again definitely
reviews.comments: Gives you airbrushed, matte look

reviews.headline: awesome bronzer
reviews.comments: one of my favorite things I received in my allure box.

reviews.headline: Beautiful and yes, I will buy again.
reviews.comments: This is a perfect color of bronzer for me, as I am light complected but also wear a year round tan.  I don't need foundation, but still want a polished look when out and about and this bronzer is perfect.  It enhances my natural color without dulling it or turning me orange.  Also, will comment that Ulta's customer service is excellent.

reviews.headline: Not happy with this bronzer
reviews.comments:
I see pan already and I have only had this bronzer 2 months.
Highly disappointed in a bronzer at this price point.
Does not have enough color payout.
Save your self money and buy a Too Faced bronzer.
Less expensive and much better!!!!

reviews.headline: Amazed!
reviews.comments: I have never been 100% happy with any bronzer, until now.  It looks natural and flattering.  Though I've a medium complexion, I bought the Deep shade because it looks like it has a reddish tone to it (compared to the other shades, based on online swatches), which my natural tan has.  The coverage is buildable- I have a feeling this is going to take me all through summer, from the light to dark tanning.  I couldn't be happier.  For me, this is well worth the price. A++

reviews.headline: Not great color payoff
reviews.comments:
Paid a hefty price for a bronzer that has no color payoff.
I expected more from an expensive bronzer.
Pretty packaging but nothing else.
I am medium skin tone and this does nit show up on me.
Really disappointed!!!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This is the absolute best powder I've ever used….and I've used em all! I'm over70 and this does not settle int cracks or crevices LOL! You won't regret this purchase!

reviews.headline: Blends beautifully!
reviews.comments: This bronzer blends so easily and gives a natural glow. I use it to set my cream bronzer. Its amazing! I use it every single day and will repurchase

reviews.headline: Doesn't look orange! Like a soft focus filter!
reviews.comments: I've only had 2 bronzers in my life that I've purchased that didn't turn orange! (Or muddy brown.)This is one of them! Using this is like a soft focus lens application!

reviews.headline: Natural glow
reviews.comments: Goes on smooth and does not make me looks orange like other bronzers. Holds well throughout tge day and gives a natural glow. I love the setting powder ans color correction products as well.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I love this bronzer, it's super easy to use for a girl like myself who is not that great at makeup. Blends out super easily and goes on smoothly for a powder.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Got this in the second shade. Product is amazing specially if you add it on top of a blended contour stick makes it look sunkissed.

reviews.headline: only pros no cons
reviews.comments: my second time purchase of this beauty

reviews.headline: Loveeeee
reviews.comments: This product is beautiful! Very easy to belnd! Not overpowering, but still had plenty of color. Best of all, its not even a little orange! It also comes with lots of product!

reviews.headline: BEAUUUUTIFUL.
reviews.comments: Ulta employee tried this bronzer on me and I ended up LOVING how it looked on my skin. Its so stunning and absolutely beautiful. Its forgiving and gives you that perfect amount of bronze without looking over done.

reviews.headline: Love It
reviews.comments: Love the bronzer

reviews.headline: AMAZING￼
reviews.comments: I love this bronzer and it's worth every penny. It's not overly pigmented so it's easy to work with and very blendable. The shades are the perfect undertone and not orange.

reviews.headline: Great Bronzer!
reviews.comments: I tried to stay away from charlotte tilbury because she is pricey, and I am about three products in to her stuff and its so so good. This is my faborite bronzer of all time, took be by surprise when I loved it so much. I use medium and it is a perfect neutral tone. It doesnt pull too orange or too cool toned, and it blends perfectly. Its perfectly pigmented, one good swirl and a tap is usually the perfect amount for whatever area I am going in at. I use this every single day and I have hit pan on it. It lasts a long time and multiple uses, and it lasts a long time on the skin.. I also use her setting spray (another gem). I just repurchased the giant bottle after going through four of the travel size ones! Haha. I wasn't messing around anymore. I can't live without my CT, and its worth the price!

reviews.headline: Best Bronzer Ever
reviews.comments: Aside from the setting spray, this is the only CT item ive ever tried. I have used MANY bronzers in my lifetime and this is the absolute best! I got the shade medium and it blends like a dream. I would say it has a satin finish. I expectations were not extremely high honestly because ive tried many 'high end' bronzers. I just felt compelled to leave a review because i cannot get over how much i love this. Truly i cannot recommend it enough. Seems like it should last a while too and i noticed you can buy refills (hopefully ulta sells these soon :)

reviews.headline: It's a yes for me!
reviews.comments: A lot of product for the price! Lasted all day and went on smoothly without patches.

This is my faborite bronzer of all time, took be by surprise when I loved it so much. I use medium and it is a perfect neutral tone. It doesnt pull too orange or too cool toned, and it blends perfectly. Its perfectly pigmented, one good swirl and a tap is usually the perfect amount for whatever area I am going in at.
